oai_dc:dc.dc:title: [Débits du Nil au Caire]
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: These two sheets are part of a larger map. They show the flow of the Nile and the canal system of Egypt. Additionally, there is information on the volume of water. Archaeological sites are also included as well as contour lines. Discoloration is due to protective sheet while scanning.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Egypt -- Maps; Nile River; Canals -- Egypt -- Maps
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Rare Books and Special Collections Library; the American University in Cairo
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: This item is in the public domain.
